bach.Series.copy¶

Series.copy()[source]¶

Return a copy of this Series.

As this series only represents data in the backing SQL store, and does not contain any data, this is a metadata copy only, no actual data is duplicated and changes to the underlying data will represented in both copy and original. Changes to index, sorting, grouping etc. on the copy will not affect the original.

If you want to create a snapshot of the data, have a look at bach.DataFrame.get_sample()

Returns

a copy of the series
